General_Description: '''Burned Hopes''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] resources are an easy target to weaken their forces."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and destroyed resource crates of the Athenians all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Ashes to Ashes (contract)|Ashes to Ashes]] and [[In flames, It Disappears]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
